General.Name: FORIS AG
General.Description: FORIS AG provides financial services in Germany. It offers commercial litigation funding services and monetization of disputed claims, as well as engages in establishing and selling shelf companies. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Bonn, Germany.
